newsitem.title: USA: Seafield registers shares for dividend.
newsitem.headline: Seafield registers shares for dividend.

text.p: Seafield Capital Corp said Tuesday it had registered with the Securities and Exchange Commission shares of SLH Corp common stock that are to be distributed as a dividend to Seafield shareholders.
SLH is a newly formed subsidiary that will acquire from Seafield all of Seafield's real estate and energy businesses and miscellaneous assets and certain liabilities.
The book value of SLH assets and liabilities as of September 30, on a pro forma distribution basis, was $47 million.

When the registration statement is effective, Seafield said it intends to distribute to its shareholders, as a dividend, all shares of SLH on the basis of one share of SLH for every four shares of Seafield. The distribution is expected to be made in late February.
Seafield said the distribution is part of its restructuring to improve shareholder values by separating SLH's assets and liabilities from Seafield's other core businesses.
After the proposed distribution, Seafield will consist of two publicly-traded operating companies -- LabOne Inc, 82 percent-owned by Seafield, and Response Oncology Inc, 56 percent-owned by Seafield.
